name: Hentai Waifu 101
description:
Hentai Waifu 101 is a Third person Shooter Game.

You will have to defeat sexy enemies with various abilities in several maps.
In which secondary objectives await you!

An incredible experience across Egypt, Japan and the USA!


  • Exciting Content Glute and Breast Physic!
  • 5 camera angles to have fun ( Known to SeedWall gamers ^_^ )
  • Pleasure Game Mode to enjoy without fighting
  • Firearms (Assault Rifle, Shotgun, Sniper, Laser Rifle, Rocket Launcher)
  • Different AIs with different abilities
  • Secondary Objectives
